snippet.title: One Way Trip - 2016 Trailer | PS4, PS Vita
snippet.description:
One Way Trip is an upcoming sadventure game that takes you on a wildly surreal journey through a trippy sci-fi future full of bright colors and dark secrets. When a mass poisoning leaves much of the nation with only six hours left to live, during which time they will be hallucinating constantly, you and your brother must decide how to spend them, and whether or not to hunt for a cure!

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit www.esrb.org for rating information.
